DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial : ( 1 ) Determine extent custom make study shoe reduce incidence reulceration diabetic individual prior history foot ulcer , ( 2 ) Estimate cost ulcer prevention use strategy .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trials Footwear Patients With Diabetes-Study Arm 2,3
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize clinical trial : ( 1 ) Determine extent custom make study shoe reduce incidence reulceration diabetic individual prior history footulcers , ( 2 ) Estimate cost ulcer prevention use strategy . Patients Seattle VA ( n=214 ) Group Health Cooperative ( n=213 ) randomly assign one two study arm . They : ( 1 ) patient wear study shoe premolded polyurethane insole ( 2 ) control group patient wear footwear .
DOC.keyword: Foot ulcer , amputation prevention , diabetes , footwear , insole
